items: Start by lying flat on your back with your arms at your sides.
Bend your knees and bring your feet close to your buttocks.
Place your hands on your lower back and lift your legs up towards the ceiling.
Slowly lift your hips off the ground and bring your legs over your head, supporting your lower back with your hands.
Extend your legs straight up towards the ceiling, keeping your neck and head relaxed on the ground.
Hold the pose for several breaths, then slowly lower your legs back down to the ground.
Improves circulation to the upper body and brain
Stimulates the thyroid gland, which can help regulate metabolism
Strengthens the shoulders, neck, and core muscles
Can help improve digestion and relieve constipation
